1 The methodology for year 2014 is to use GHGRP emissions data as-reported (rather than an EFxAF approach, per se).  The emission factors in this table were populated by dividing 2014 emissions by 2014 refinery feed rate.
Note: Energy use CO2 emissions not estimated to avoid double counting with fossil fuel combustion
